Welcome Player!.text: You want to make a an app... It should be a good one. What do you do?

Download a framework.text: Performance takes a nose dive. Users leave you. Why did you do this?

Start hacking.text: You start hacking. You discover that your app is getting complex. What do you do?

Keep hacking.text: Things are getting pretty rough now. You have to work with dates and times.

Download a library.text:
You download a library. It works! You are incredibly wise.

A wild Project Manager approaches. What do you do?

Hide under your desk.text: The Project Manager looks under your desk, this is the third time you've tried this tactic. They are unhappy, and force you to download a framework.

Panic.text: You panic. They notice, and believe you incapable of handling the pressure of the project. They force you to download a framework.

Blank them.text:
Congratulations! The Project Manager mistakes your rudeness of a person so deeply in "The Zone" that they cannot be interrupted.

You ship your app.
